translation: Sages look with an equal eye on a Brahmana endowed with learning and humility, on a cow, an elephant, a dog, and even an outcaste.
commentary: 5.18 Vidyavinayasampanne upon one endowed with learning and humility? Brahmane on a Brahmana? Gavi on a cow? Hastini on an elephant? Shuni on a dog? f and? Eve even? Shvapake on an outcaste? f and? The wise sages? samadarsinah eal seeing.Commentary The liberated sage or Jivanmukta or a Brahmana has eal vision as he beholds the Self only everywhere. This magnificent vision of a Jnani is beyond description.
